item.title: HyperX’s new gaming headset claims to last 250 hours on a single charge
item.description: HP-owned HyperX is announcing a slew of new gaming headsets and streaming-friendly microphones. The HyperX Cloud Alpha 2 is the new flagship at $299.99. It uses 53mm drivers and 2.4GHz wireless lastin

item.title: HP OmniBook X Flip 14 Review: Flip Flop
